titleStmt.title: A breviat of some proposals prepared to be offered to the great wisdom of the nation, the King's Most Excellent Majesty, and both houses of Parliament for the speedy restoring the woollen manufacture by a method practiced in other nations ... / by R. Haines.
titleStmt.author: Haines, Richard, 1633-1685.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
